thread.title: Amar Akbar Anthony’s Manjadum song released
thread.title_full: Amar Akbar Anthony’s Manjadum song released - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Amar Akbar Anthony’s Manjadum song released
text:
'Manjadum' crooned by Vijay Yesudas, Afsal and Samad, is composed by director Nadhirshah and written by Santhosh Varma.
Apart from this film has another three songs. The second song, "Premamennal", is sung by Prithviraj, Indrajith, Jayasoorya and Kalabhavan Shajon. While the third song, "Yenno Njanente" is sung by Baby Sreya and the fourth , "Pranayam", is penned and crooned by Nadhirshah.
The multi-starrer film, which is the debut directorial by Nadhirshah, is touted to be a comedy thriller. The script of the film is written by Bibin George and Vishnu Unnikrishnan.
